# CI/CD Status Badges

Add these badges to your README.md to show CI/CD status:

## Markdown

```markdown
![CI Pipeline](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/BuildMyHouse/workflows/CI%20Pipeline/badge.svg)
![Deploy to Staging](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/BuildMyHouse/workflows/Deploy%20to%20Staging/badge.svg)
![Deploy to Production](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/BuildMyHouse/workflows/Deploy%20to%20Production/badge.svg)
```

## Example README Section

```markdown
## CI/CD Status

[![CI Pipeline](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/BuildMyHouse/workflows/CI%20Pipeline/badge.svg)](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/BuildMyHouse/actions)
[![Deploy to Staging](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/BuildMyHouse/workflows/Deploy%20to%20Staging/badge.svg)](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/BuildMyHouse/actions)
[![Deploy to Production](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/BuildMyHouse/workflows/Deploy%20to%20Production/badge.svg)](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/BuildMyHouse/actions)
```

**Note:** Replace `YOUR_USERNAME` with your GitHub username or organization name.
